column1: Little Goat Diner////Sofiya - we love that you're branching out and that we were able to expand your palate a bit! We love hearing that our servers anticipated your needs and made sure you were well taken care of. It's excellent that you enjoyed the Bull's Eye French Toast as well as the Okonomiyaki
column2: and given your adventure to try new things we think these are excellent choices! We're very happy that you saved room to stop by sugargoat and tried an assortment of their outstanding sweet offerings. We're delighted that you're supporting Little Goat and we hope you'll swing by again soon!
